extendedInfo.description: Whether back pain or weight problems, whether beginner or professional, the new app from FLEXI-SPORTS makes training possible anywhere. You will feel the success immediately. Experience this unique workout and get a completely new feeling of your body. Training can be so efficient! - Prevention / relief of back pain- Pelvic floor exercises- Improved posture- Fat burning- Getting back into shape after a pregnancy- Strengthening connective tissue- Full body workout- 7-day programsImpressive features:- countless exercise videos with our experts - 7-day programs: find the right training program for your needs- My exercises: pick out your favorite exercises- Detailed information about our unique quality products- My data: your training progress is well documented (training history, weight diary, BMI calculator, photo gallery before / after)- Ask the trainer: you have a specific question about your training? We are pleased to answer it.Do not hesitate and get this brilliant training app!
